Constructor Detail

Q

public Q(String query)
  throws ZException
Create with give query. Query is signle HiveQL statment. Query can be templated by erb. ZContext is injected to the template

Parameters:
query -
Throws:
ZException

withResource

public Q withResource(URI r)
add resource required by this query. ether normal file or jar. Will be automatically added before executing this query. ie. ADD FILE [uri] or ADD JAR [uri] is executed automatically.

Parameters:
r -
Returns:

getQuery

public String getQuery()
                throws ZException
Get query to be executed. Template is evaluated with ZContext. And CREATE TABLE or CREATE VIEW statment is added in front of query according to settings

Specified by:
getQuery in class Z
Returns:
HiveQL compatible query
Throws:
ZException
